channel.title: Can anyone help me please?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to lock a shop so that you need a certain rank to be able to view and buy the items in he shop.
Also i have been trying and trying and trying to portforward and i just can't seem to get it online. If someone at least helps me get my game online i will pay them 10$ via paypal.
Thank you!

item.title: Can anyone help me please?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

if(shopID == IDOFSHOP) { if(donator == 0) { sendMessage("Only donators can buy items from this shop!"); return; } }

donator should be your variable for premium/donator.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help me please?
item.dc:creator: @ServerSoft6567 ServerSoft6567
item.description:
@ServerSoft6567 wrote:

Yes, I do. Could you please post what server deob you have, so that I could help you?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2009, 06:34:58 pm[/size][hr]Also, download uTorrent. It’s very simple and free. Also, make sure you allow all incomming connections through Windows Firewall. Allowing exceptions through Firewall can be google searched, and utorrent can be google searched aswell.
